lowCreditWarning.title: Low Credit Warning!
lowCreditWarning.message: Check to see if you can top up with free credits or purchase some more!

autoApprovedRequestLimitReached.title: Auto-Approved Request Limit Reached
autoApprovedRequestLimitReached.description: Kilo Code has reached the auto-approved limit of {{count}} API requests. Would you like to reset the count and proceed with the task?
